worksheet.title: Worksheets
worksheet.subtitle: Manage dental worksheets with EU MDR Annex XIII compliance
worksheet.noWorksheetsDesc: Create your first worksheet to get started
worksheet.createWorksheetSubtitle: Create a new dental worksheet with FDI teeth notation and material tracking
worksheet.selectOrderDesc: Choose an order to create a worksheet for
worksheet.noOrdersAvailable: No orders available for worksheet creation. All orders either have worksheets or are not in PENDING status.
worksheet.formCreateDescription: Create a new dental worksheet with FDI teeth notation, product selection, and material assignment.
worksheet.formEditDescriptionReadOnly: Worksheet is in {status} status and cannot be edited. Only DRAFT worksheets can be modified.
worksheet.formEditDescription: Edit worksheet details. Changes will replace existing assignments (replace all pattern).
worksheet.formReadOnlyWarning: This worksheet cannot be edited. Only worksheets in DRAFT status can be modified.
worksheet.deviceDescriptionDescription: Brief description of the custom-made dental device (EU MDR Annex XIII requirement)
worksheet.intendedUsePlaceholder: Specify the intended use and clinical indication...
worksheet.intendedUseDescription: Clinical purpose and intended use of the device
worksheet.technicalNotesPlaceholder: Add any technical notes or special instructions...
worksheet.technicalNotesDescription: Technical specifications, manufacturing notes, or special instructions
worksheet.teethSelectionDescription: Select teeth using the FDI two-digit notation system and assign work types.
worksheet.productSelectionDescription: Select dental products from the pricing list with quantities and pricing.
worksheet.materialSelectionDescription: Select materials with FIFO indication. Materials will be consumed when worksheet transitions to IN_PRODUCTION status.
worksheet.detailProductsDescription: Products with material traceability and LOT tracking
worksheet.detailGenerateAnnexPrompt: Click "Generate Annex XIII" above to create the manufacturer's statement
worksheet.workflowStartProductionDesc: Materials will be consumed via FIFO and manufacture date will be set.
worksheet.workflowSubmitQCDesc: Submit worksheet for quality control inspection.
worksheet.workflowApproveQCDesc: Annex XIII document will be generated automatically.
worksheet.workflowRejectQCDesc: Worksheet will be returned to production for rework.
worksheet.workflowResumeProductionDesc: Resume production after addressing QC feedback.
worksheet.workflowCancelWorksheetDesc: Cancel this worksheet. This action cannot be undone.
worksheet.workflowVoidedMessage: This worksheet has been voided. A new worksheet with revision suffix must be created.
worksheet.workflowDeliveredMessage: This worksheet has been delivered. No further actions available.
worksheet.workflowNoTransitions: No transitions available for current status.
worksheet.workflowMissingLotsWarning: {count} material{s} don't have LOT numbers assigned. You can assign them during production or before QC approval.
worksheet.workflowNotesRequired: Notes are required for this transition.
worksheet.voidBullet1: Mark this worksheet as VOIDED (preserved for audit trail)
worksheet.voidBullet2: Allow creation of a new corrected worksheet
worksheet.voidBullet3: New worksheet will have revision suffix (e.g., {number}-R1)
worksheet.voidWarning: ⚠️ This action cannot be undone. The worksheet will be preserved but marked as invalid.
worksheet.voidReasonPlaceholder: e.g., Wrong ceramic material used, incorrect shade, patient rejected prosthetic...
worksheet.voidReasonHelp: This reason will be permanently recorded in the audit log.
worksheet.voidToastErrorDesc: Please provide a reason for voiding
worksheet.voidToastSuccessDesc: {number} has been voided. You can create a new worksheet for this order.
worksheet.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {number}?
worksheet.deleteBullet2: Remove all associated products and materials
worksheet.deleteBullet4: Remove from audit logs (where not required)
worksheet.deleteWarning: ⚠️ This action cannot be undone. The worksheet will be permanently deleted.
worksheet.deleteOrderRemains: The order will remain in PENDING status and you can create a new worksheet.
worksheet.auditTrail: Complete audit trail of all changes ({count} entries)

material.scannerNoCameraError: No camera detected on this device

material.toastDuplicateLOT: LOT number already exists for this material. Please check existing LOTs or use a different number.

material.duplicateFoundDesc: A material matching this scan already exists in the database

qualityControl.dashboardSubtitle: Inspect and approve worksheets before invoicing
qualityControl.searchPlaceholder: Search by DN-number, dentist, patient, or clinic...
qualityControl.completedWorksheetsDescription: Worksheets that have passed QC inspection
qualityControl.inspectionPageDescription: Review and approve worksheet before invoicing
qualityControl.qualityControlChecklistDescription: Check all items that meet quality standards ({passedChecks}/5 passed)
qualityControl.checkAllDescription: Select all 5 quality control items at once
qualityControl.aestheticsDescription: Visual appearance, polish, texture, and overall finish quality
qualityControl.fitDescription: Device meets prescribed dimensions and proper seating
qualityControl.occlusionDescription: Proper bite alignment and functional contact points
qualityControl.marginsDescription: Margin quality, integrity, and sealing for longevity
qualityControl.riskClassDescription: MDR risk class for dental prostheses (typically Class IIa)
qualityControl.annexIDeviationsPlaceholder: List any deviations from Annex I requirements...
qualityControl.annexIDeviationsDescription: Leave empty if device is fully compliant with all Annex I requirements
qualityControl.documentVersionDescription: Version number for this Annex XIII document
qualityControl.inspectorNotesPlaceholder: Add any observations, minor issues, or recommendations...
qualityControl.actionRequiredPlaceholder: Describe what needs to be fixed or reworked...
qualityControl.confirmApprovalMessage: You are about to APPROVE this worksheet. All quality checks have passed. The worksheet will be ready for invoicing.
qualityControl.confirmConditionalMessage: You are about to CONDITIONALLY APPROVE this worksheet. Most quality checks have passed with minor notes. The worksheet will be ready for invoicing.
qualityControl.confirmRejectionMessage: You are about to REJECT this worksheet. It will be returned to production for rework based on your action required notes.
qualityControl.validationApprovedAllChecks: All 5 quality checks must pass for APPROVED status
qualityControl.validationConditionalMinChecks: At least 4 quality checks must pass for CONDITIONAL status
qualityControl.validationConditionalNotes: Notes are required for CONDITIONAL approval
qualityControl.validationRejectedAtLeastOne: At least one quality check must fail for REJECTED status
qualityControl.validationRejectedActionRequired: Action Required field is mandatory for REJECTED status
qualityControl.reviewAndApprove: Review and approve worksheet before invoicing

invoices.issuedByInfo: Person responsible for issuing this invoice
invoices.applyTaxLabel: Apply tax (medical services are typically tax-exempt)
invoices.notesPlaceholder: Add any additional notes for this invoice
invoices.draftInfo: Drafts can be edited later. Finalized invoices receive an invoice number (RAC-YYYY-NNN) and cannot be edited.

invoices.issuedByHint: Person responsible for issuing this invoice
invoices.addProductDescription: Select a product from your catalog and specify the quantity
invoices.draftInvoiceMessage: This invoice is in draft status. Click "Finalize Invoice" above to assign an invoice number and generate the PDF.
invoices.canceledInvoiceMessage: This invoice has been canceled. The related worksheet has been reverted to QC_APPROVED status and is available for re-invoicing.
invoices.canceledInvoiceDeleteHint: You can permanently delete this invoice using the "Delete" button above.
invoices.dentistEmailNotAvailable: Dentist email address is not available

Are you sure you want to delete draft invoice {number}?

Send invoice {number} to {email}?

annexPdf.documentTitle: EU MDR ANNEX XIII - Manufacturer's Statement for Custom-Made Devices
annexPdf.traceabilityDescription: Complete list of all products manufactured and materials used, including LOT numbers for full traceability as required by EU MDR.
annexPdf.fullComplianceText: This device fully complies with all Annex I general safety and performance requirements of EU MDR 2017/745. No deviations recorded.
annexPdf.declarationIntro: We, {laboratoryName}, hereby declare that the custom-made dental device described in this document has been manufactured in accordance with:
annexPdf.declarationItem2: Annex XIII requirements for custom-made devices
annexPdf.declarationItem4: Applicable harmonized standards and technical specifications
annexPdf.biocompatibilityText: All materials used in this device comply with ISO 10993 standards for biological evaluation of medical devices.
annexPdf.ceMarkingText: All materials used are CE marked where applicable, ensuring compliance with EU safety and performance requirements.
annexPdf.patientSpecificText: This device has been manufactured specifically for the patient identified in this statement and is intended solely for use by that patient. The device meets the essential safety and performance requirements applicable to it.
annexPdf.title: Title:
annexPdf.retentionNotice: ⚠️ RETENTION REQUIREMENT: This document must be retained until {retentionUntil} (10 years from generation date) in accordance with EU MDR Article 10(8) requirements.
annexPdf.documentTypeValue: EU MDR Annex XIII Manufacturer's Statement
annexPdf.footerCourtRegistration: Company is registered at the District Court of Ljubljana.

orderDetail.deleteCancelledConfirm: Delete this cancelled worksheet? This will allow you to create a new worksheet (next revision).

orderDetail.deleteWorksheetConfirm: Delete this cancelled worksheet? This will allow you to create a new worksheet (next revision).

worksheetPdf.title: PRODUCTION WORKSHEET
worksheetPdf.complianceStatement: I declare and assume full responsibility for the compliance of the product with the essential requirements of the Medical Devices Regulation (Ur.l.RS No. 71/03).

sop.title: Standard Operating Procedures
sop.subtitle: Manage SOPs and track acknowledgments
sop.listDescription: Create and manage Standard Operating Procedures for EU MDR compliance

createPage.title: Create New SOP
createPage.subtitle: Draft a new Standard Operating Procedure for EU MDR compliance
createPage.basicInfoDescription: SOP code will be auto-generated (SOP-001, SOP-002, etc.)
createPage.sopTitlePlaceholder: Enter SOP title (e.g., Material Sterilization Process)
createPage.contentDescription: Write detailed step-by-step procedures. Include purpose, scope, responsibilities, and instructions.
createPage.contentPlaceholder: Start writing your SOP content... Include sections like Purpose, Scope, Responsibilities, Procedures, Quality Control, etc.
createPage.saveNote: The SOP will be saved as DRAFT and can be edited until approved.

editPage.title: Edit SOP
editPage.versioningInfo: This SOP is APPROVED. Editing will create a new version and archive the current one. Major content changes will increment the major version (e.g., 1.0 → 2.0), while minor changes increment the minor version (e.g., 1.0 → 1.1).
editPage.saveNote: Saving will create a new version and archive the current one.
editPage.draftNote: The SOP will remain in DRAFT status until approved.

detailPage.contentDescription: Standard Operating Procedure details and instructions
detailPage.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {code} - {title}? This action cannot be undone. Only DRAFT SOPs can be deleted.
detailPage.title: Title
detailPage.readBeforeAcknowledging: Read and understand this procedure before acknowledging
